subject: Re: How to build customised runner?.
msgSnippet: ... Thanks foir your suggestion. I tried to use parameterised test cases. On eproblem i found was it is going to create test case names like method[0],
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Nat Pryce" <nat.pryce@...> wrote:
>
> 2008/11/10 madavahegde <madavahegde@...>:
> > I want to gnerate test cases at run time . TO achieve this i feel like
> > i need to use customised runner.
>
> It will probably be easier to use a parameterised test than to write
> your own test runner.
>
> --Nat
>
> --
> Random musings at http://www.natpryce.com
>

Thanks foir your suggestion.

I tried to use parameterised test cases. On eproblem i found was it is
going to create test case names like method[0], method[1]..........
I need to get some meaning full name there. Is there any way to
achieve this.
